author: cms-patatrack
body:
This PR includes in a single commit all the Patatrack developments from the past 2-3 years.

There are still few pending issues we want to address before making the actual PRs:
  - drop the old heterogenous framework
  - remove the usage of the CUDA API Wrappers
  - update the code base to the latest 11.0.x developments (e.g. Pixel CPE changes)
  - integrate the ECAL and HCAL work

However, I would ask all affected L2's to have a look at the changes in theiir packages, and suggest how they would like them to be split and organised.

Of course, any comments on the code itself are welcome !
title: [request for comment] Squash all Patatrack developments on top of CMSSW_11_0_0_pre7
